languages.text: "Но спасибо на добром слове. Приятно знать, что мои солдатские словечки не отпугнули тебя". {n}Джай снова ухмыляется, в этот раз совсем по-доброму.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Но спасибо на добром слове. Приятно знать, что хоть кто-то желает видеть меня... настоящей". {n}Джай снова ухмыляется, в этот раз совсем по-доброму.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "But thanks for the kind words. It's good to know that my soldier's tongue hasn't scared you off." {n}Jae grins again, this time much more warmly.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Но спасибо на добром слове. Приятно знать, что мои солдатские словечки не отпугнули тебя". {n}Джай снова ухмыляется, в этот раз совсем по-доброму.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "But thanks for the kind words. It's good to know that my soldier's tongue hasn't scared you off." {n}Jae grins again, this time much more warmly.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "But thanks for the kind words. It feels good to know at least someone wants to see... the real me." {n}Jae grins again, this time in a much kinder way.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "But thanks for the kind words. It's good to know that my soldier's tongue hasn't scared you off." {n}Jae grins again, this time much more warmly.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “不过，谢谢你的好意。我那些士兵的粗话没把你吓跑，这让我很开心。”{n}婕伊又笑了起来，这次的笑容要亲切得多。{/n}
languages.original_text: "But thanks for the kind words. It's good to know that my soldier's tongue hasn't scared you off." {n}Jae grins again, this time much more warmly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “不过，谢谢你的好意。知道至少还有人愿意看到……真正的我，这让我很开心。”{n}婕伊又笑了起来，这次的笑容要亲切得多。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "But thanks for the kind words. It's good to know that my soldier's tongue hasn't scared you off." {n}Jae grins again, this time much more warmly.{/n}

languages.text: «Pero gracias por esas palabras tan amables. Me alegro de ver que mi lengua de soldado no le ha espantado». {n}Jae vuelve a sonreír, esta vez con mucho más afecto.{/n}
languages.original_text: "But thanks for the kind words. It's good to know that my soldier's tongue hasn't scared you off." {n}Jae grins again, this time much more warmly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Pero gracias por esas palabras tan amables. Sienta bien saber que al menos una persona quiere ver... a mi auténtica yo». {n}Jae vuelve a sonreír, esta vez con mucha más alegría.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「だけど、優しい言葉をありがとう。あたしの兵士の言葉がビビらせてなくてよかったわ」{n}ジェイは再び微笑んだ。その笑顔には先ほどより温かさがある。{/n}
languages.original_text: "But thanks for the kind words. It's good to know that my soldier's tongue hasn't scared you off." {n}Jae grins again, this time much more warmly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「だけど、優しい言葉をありがとう。あたしの兵士の言葉がビビらせてなくてよかったわ」{n}ジェイは再び微笑んだ。その笑顔には先ほどより温かさがある。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Aber danke für die freundlichen Worte. Schön, dass mein Soldaten-Schandmaul Euch nicht verschreckt hat." {n}Jae grinst wieder, diesmal viel wärmer.{/n}
languages.original_text: "But thanks for the kind words. It's good to know that my soldier's tongue hasn't scared you off." {n}Jae grins again, this time much more warmly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Aber danke für die freundlichen Worte. Schön, dass zumindest eine Person ... mein wahres Ich sehen will." {n}Jae grinst wieder, diesmal viel freundlicher.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Mais je vous remercie de votre sollicitude. Je suis soulagée de constater que mon franc-parler ne vous a pas fait fuir. » {n}Elle vous adresse un autre sourire, bien plus chaleureux, cette fois.{/n}
languages.original_text: "But thanks for the kind words. It's good to know that my soldier's tongue hasn't scared you off." {n}Jae grins again, this time much more warmly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Mais je vous remercie de votre sollicitude. C'est agréable de savoir qu'il y a au moins une personne qui veut voir... la vraie Jae. » {n}Elle sourit à nouveau, mais cette fois d'une façon beaucoup plus douce.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Nazik sözlerin içinse teşekkür ederim. Askerlikten kalma keskin dilimin seni korkutup kaçırmadığını görmek güzel." {n}Jae bir kez daha gülümsüyor. Bu seferki gülüşü çok daha sıcak.{/n}
languages.original_text: "But thanks for the kind words. It's good to know that my soldier's tongue hasn't scared you off." {n}Jae grins again, this time much more warmly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Nazik sözlerin için sağ ol ama. Askerden kalma keskin dilimin seni korkutup kaçırmadığını görmek güzel." {n}Jae bir kez daha gülümsüyor. Bu seferki gülüşü çok daha sıcak.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
